content: get a life no really get a life see the full blog post **here** 1 and have fun making these little life-savers you re free to sell finished products you make from my patterns but copying and distributing the patterns themselves is prohibited just credit me @geekyhooker and link back to the pattern if you sell online tag me in your photos on social media i love seeing how everything turns out 1 https //geekyhooker com/get-a-life/
